attributes.action: Release the 4th SEISS grant now for payment immediately. April is too late.
attributes.additional_details:
The vague 'April' date for the 4th grant is NOT good enough.

Most of us have been hanging on by the threads for long enough.

A lot of self employed individuals are now struggling to make ends meet.

Opening the application for the 4th grant in April is too late. 
Food & bills need to be paid for. 

Open the application for the 4th Self Employed grant NOW. For payment immediately after.
attributes.background:
We want the government to open the applications for the forth SEISS grant now.
With payment immediately after. 
April is too late.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577730

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you find out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips

You can read impartial analysis of the Government response to coronavirus and policy developments here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/coronavirus/
